innateWeapon.attackHitDescription: The #userName# attacks you with it's default dealing #damage#
innateWeapon.attackMissDescription: The #userName# attacks you with it's default but misses
innateWeapon.playerAttackHitDescription: You attack #targetName# with your default and deal #damage# damage
innateWeapon.playerAttackMissDescription: You attack #targetName# with your default but miss
